$comment: Example: Simple Entity CRUD Wrapper - Create Operation
Name: Create Conversation Record
Description: Creates a new Conversation record with entity-specific parameters instead of requiring generic EntityName and Fields parameters. Demonstrates the child action pattern for simplified CRUD operations.
UserPrompt: Create a record in the Conversations entity using parameters from this action and maps to the parent Create Record action and its format for parameters
UserComments: This is a simple example of the child action pattern. It wraps the generic 'Create Record' action and provides entity-specific parameters for the Conversations table. The AI will automatically generate parameters for all Conversations fields, mark UserID and Type as required (based on entity schema), and create an output parameter for the new ConversationID.

Parameters.Name: UserID
Parameters.Description: The user who owns the conversation

Parameters.Comment: AI generates parameters for all entity fields

Parameters.Name: ConversationID
Parameters.Description: The ID of the newly created conversation

ResultCodes.Description: The parent Create Record action failed
Failed to retrieve ConversationID from parent result
